action.description: Read Third Time in Full – ADOPTED - 51-16-3AYES – Achilles, Alfieri, Andrus, Berch, Boyle, Cannon, Cheatum, Church(Caldwell), Clow, Cornilles, Crane(12), Crane(13), Dygert, Egbert, Ehardt, Ehlers, Erickson, Fuhriman, Furniss, Galaviz, Gannon, Garner, Green, Handy, Healey, Holtzclaw, Horman, Manwaring, McCann, Mendive, Mickelsen, Miller, Mitchell, Monks, Nelsen, Palmer, Petzke, Pickett, Pohanka, Raybould, Raymond, Redman, Rubel, Sauter, Scott(Scott), Shirts, Tanner(13), Vander Woude, Weber, Wheeler, Mr. SpeakerNAYS – Barbieri, Beiswenger, Burgoyne, Cayler, Harris, Hawkins, Hostetler, Leavitt, Marmon, Price, Rasor, Shepherd, Skaug, Tanner(14), Thompson, WisniewskiAbsent – Bruce, Hill, MathiasFloor Sponsor - RedmanTitle apvd - to Senate
